Returns true if compression is available.

char* openvdb::v3_1_0::tools::attribute_compression::compress ( const char *  buffer,
const size_t  typeSize,
const int  uncompressedBytes,
int &  compressedBytes 
)

Compress and return the compressed buffer.

Parameters:
buffer the buffer to compress
typeSize the size of the data type
uncompressedBytes number of uncompressed bytes
compressedBytes number of compressed bytes (written to this variable)
Note:
Unlike the non-const buffer version, the buffer will never be deleted.

const size_t  typeSize,
const int  uncompressedBytes,
int &  compressedBytes,
const bool  cleanup = false 
)

Compress and return the compressed buffer.

Parameters:
buffer the buffer to compress
typeSize the size of the data type
uncompressedBytes number of uncompressed bytes
compressedBytes number of compressed bytes (written to this variable)
cleanup if true, the supplied buffer will be deleted prior to allocating new memory
